Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.renderer

package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.renderer
  • Class
    Description
    AnimatedImage
    Animated Image Accepts a List of RenderImg, it then goes through that list and rendering the next one in the list, and going back to the first item once the list has been exhausted.
    AudioP
    This class is responsible for loading audio files into memory.
    DirectoryStructure
    For Directory Structure, alot of it was "inspired" from Assigment 1.
    Img
    Img class using Singleton pattern to load and cache images.
    ImgOld
    This is the class that is responsible for LOADING the Images into Cache only and finding them It's important to note that if the Enum's name as a file doesn't exist in the imgs folder it WILL break eg.
    Renderer
    This is the Renderer that handles the logic for rendering.
    RenderImg
    Deprecated.
    UpdatedAnimation
    UpdatedAnimation handles animations by cycling through multiple image frames.
